mods.name: Tyrosine Injector
mods.desc: Lading a critical hit increases your change to mitigate damage taken from an attack by 40%. This has a 50% chance to occur.

mods.name: Atomic Sensors
mods.desc: If attacked first at the start of a battle, increases your chance to mitigate damage taken from an attack by 40%. This has a 40% chance to occur.

mods.name: Nanorelays
mods.desc: The first critical hit against you is converted into regular damage.

mods.name: NeoFiber
mods.desc: Grants a chance to mitigate damage taken from an attack by 40%. This has a 15% chance to occur.

mods.name: Synaptic Accelerator
mods.desc: At the start of a battle, atacks are guaranteed to hit, with a bonus crit chance of 15%

mods.name: Kerenzikov
mods.desc: Gain a 10% chance to dodge attacks.

mods.name: Stabber
mods.desc: Sharp weapons, including Mantis Blades, gain 10% crit chance.

mods.name: Nanosurgeons
mods.desc: For every 20% of HP missing, increases your chance to mitigate damage taken by 40%. This has a 4% chance to occur, for every 20% missing.

mods.name: Reflex Infusor
mods.desc: If you are defeated by a melee attack, return one final attack before being defeated. Cannot heal from this state. Once per battle.
